statements: UPDATE materials SET price = 15.99, quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE materials SET category = 'Electronics', supplier_id = 2 WHERE material_name = 'Laptop';

UPDATE materials
SET price = 15.50, quantity = 100
WHERE material_id = 1

UPDATE materials
SET material_name = 'Steel Panels', supplier_id = 5, price = 25.75
WHERE category = 'Construction'
UPDATE materials SET material_name='Wood', supplier_contact='123-456-7890' WHERE material_id=1;
UPDATE materials SET supplier_contact='999-999-9999', supplier_name='Supplier 2' WHERE supplier_id=2;
UPDATE materials SET material_name = 'Wood', supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE materials SET material_type = 'Metallic', supplier_contact = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE material SET quantity_on_hand = 20, price = 150.75 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE supplier SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE material SET price = 25.00, quantity_on_hand = 100 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE supplier SET phone_number = '+1 (123) 456-7890', supplier_name = 'New Supplier' WHERE supplier_id = 3;
UPDATE materials SET price = 25.50 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET phone_number = '+1-202-555-0123' WHERE supplier_id = 3;
UPDATE materials SET price = 5000.50, material_category = 'Metal' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE projects SET budget = 10000.00, start_date = '2021-07-01', end_date = '2021-12-31' WHERE project_id = 5;
UPDATE materials SET supplier_id = 1 WHERE material_id = 100;
UPDATE projects SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
UPDATE materials SET material_description = 'New description' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE supplier_materials SET price = 25.50 WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND material_id = 3;
